description: Gateway logs repeated 'failed to decode message: UUID parsing failed ... found r at 1' when web and mobile clients are both connected. Confirm emitting client payloads, normalize request-id handling in decode path, and keep protocol compatibility with legacy/non-uuid request IDs.
acceptance_criteria: No repeated decode warnings during normal web+mobile usage; RPC functionality unchanged; regression test added in core connection decode path.
notes: Implemented protocol decode hardening in src/core/src/connection.rs: legacy decode now accepts typeless request envelopes and non-UUID string IDs, and ignores non-request envelopes instead of warning. Added regression tests: decode_legacy_request_accepts_non_uuid_string_id, decode_legacy_request_accepts_typeless_request, decode_legacy_request_ignores_non_request_messages. Pending runtime smoke validation against simultaneous web+mobile connections.
